name: Wishlist OS
description: Wishlist OSTransform the way you track and manage your wishlist items with our innovative Wishlist Template. Designed to provide a comprehensive and user-friendly experience, this template ensures that your desires and priorities are always within reach.Our Wishlist Template offers a range of exceptional features to help you keep track of your wishlist items effortlessly:Categories Counter: Stay informed about the number of items in each category, allowing you to maintain balance and prioritize
features: Categories Counter: Stay informed about the number of items in each category, allowing you to maintain balance and prioritize your wishlist efficiently.; Multiple Views: Sort and filter your wishlist items in various ways, such as by category or purchased status, providing you with a customizable and streamlined experience.; Calendar View: Set target dates for your wishlist items and visualize them on an intuitive calendar view, helping you plan and achieve your goals in a timely manner.; Pay what you think is fair (or enter "0" to get it for free!); Continue with the checkout process and add your email; You'll receive an email containing the link and be redirected to the product page; Before you click on the template link make sure to give this product a rating; Open the Notion link and click duplicate in the top right corner and enjoy!
